title: Can't access the pbe page.
body: so for a while now I've been trying to go sign up for the pbe only to be met by an error 500 I thought maybe it's my browser so I tried another one (chrome) but no luck then I thought I had a bad link so I looked around and even just today I tried a link posted by a rioter in response to a similar problem [link to the similar post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/KoOPTwrR-i-can-not-create-an-account-on-pbe?comment=0000)) but I'm still getting an error 500. so is the pbe page down and no one's noticed or am I just unable to access it for some reason?plz send help.

replies.body:
Hey, I see you've already tried to good link from the other post I replied to about this. Can you reply with a screenshot of the exact error you're seeing? I'd like to see if it's a slightly different error and what URL your browser is trying to access. Be sure to block off any information you don't want to display, and recommended host sites are[ Imgur](https://imgur.com/) or [Gyazo.](https://gyazo.com/en)

Thanks!
ya no problem here's a screenshot of what I'm seeing [Click here](http://imgur.com/a/Jg2hC)

Interesting error, I've never seen this one before. It's possible that it's caused by a problem in your browser's cache. I recommend clearing out the cache/cookies from your browsers and see if this makes a difference. [Here's our guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) on how to do this.
I followed the guide for google chrome but I'm still getting the same error.

Hmm.. There may be other local factors at play that are causing this issue. I suggest [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with our technical specialists with a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) so they can investigate further.

Let me know if you have any questions.
